properties.title: Historic Museum Baden
properties.abstract: The historic museum Baden takes you on a digital journey through the fascinating history of Baden. From the Romans to the bourgeois 19th Century, right up to the present day, it gives you a comprehensive picture of the development of the city's history.
properties.description:
In the august Landvogteischloss (governor's castle) with its prominent new building close to the Limmat, you can find out everything you need to know about the history of Baden. Walk through an apartment furnished in the Thirties style, learn about past views of the world or find out more about the importance of Baden as a conference, bathing and industrial centre. The Baden Museum tells the history of Baden from the Romans to the present day, addresses the corresponding spirit of the age and highlights the changes in society and environment. In addition to the historic viewpoint, current topics are regularly on the agenda in Baden.

You can explore the multimedia permanent exhibition on your own or with one of the exciting guided tours, which are dedicated to very different topics.
